original_title: Immunoglobulin Probe Intensifies: Former Health Secretary & Key Figures in Court
original_body_lines: Six individuals including former Health Ministry Secretary Janaka Sri Chandragupta were produced before the Maligakanda Magistrate today over the controversial Human Immunoglobulin transactions.
Director of the Health Ministry's Medical Supplies Division, Dr. Kapila Wickramanayaka and the owner of the pharmaceutical company involved in the transaction were also produced before court.
Meanwhile, the Criminal Investigation Department said that the Former Minister of Health Keheliya Rambukwella recorded a statement for seven-and-a-half hours over the matter yesterday.
The statement was recorded from the Minister at his residence from 9:00 am to 4:15 pm.
The chieftain or the main ‘kapu mahatha’ of the Kataragama Maha Devalaya, arrested by the Colombo Crimes Division.
Kudu Roshan and others were arrested by the ‘Yukthiya’ operation
